{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planet |model=WDRT-750AC |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B00JKV1SJW;DE; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1606E |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|750Mbps 11AC Dual-Band Wireless Broadband Router}}
[http://www.glob-all.ca/planet-wdrt-750ac-750mbps-802-11ac-wireless-broadband-router.html?___store=default&___from_store=default Product info]
===Specifications=== *Product Segment: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac AC750; 300Mbps (2.4GHz) + 433Mbps (5GHz) *Antenna: 2x internal PCB antenna *Ports: 5x RJ45 for 10/100 BaseT for WAN *Power Supply: :AC Input : 110~240V (50~60Hz) :DC Output : 12V with max 0.5A current
===Additional external links=== :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A @580MHz (2T2R 802.11bgn) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7610EN (1T1R 802.11an/ac)
====Misc==== *[http://www.likelyanswers.com/6778055/Mediatek-First-To-Bring-80211ac-1t1r-dual-Band-Concurrent-Home-Networks MediaTek press release]
